content: AC-D P Type 1 Cut-off wheel Standard thin cut-off wheel for cutting stainless/carbon steel using an angle grinder ### Categories: Home > Products > Tool inserts > Abrasives- - - ### FEATURES:Features Built for real jobsites – versatile cutting disc with a flexible bond to help you get through everyday cutting jobs quicker, more comfortably and with fewer blade changes Helps to reduce time spent reworking – when you need a cleaner edge, cut-off wheels with a thickness of less than 1/16” (2 mm) are essential ANSI B7.1 compliant and OSA certified – these cutting wheels comply with the highest safety standards Applications Cutting steel and stainless steel pipes, rods, profiles and metal sheets Pipeline applications such as cutting, light notching on steel or stainless steel ### TECHNICAL DATA: Product Class: Standard Base material: Steel, Stainless steel Tool type: Angle grinder Technical Data | Product Class | Standard | Base material | Steel, Stainless steel | Tool type | Angle grinder | Disclaimer | Use angle grinder with double-sided guard | Blade / disc shape | Flat, Type 1 | Arbor size | 7/8 in ### ITEMS- 2235177 - Cutting disc 4.5 x .045 x 7/8 T1 P - Package Size 25 pc - 2235178 - Cutting disc 5 x .045 x 7/8 T1 P - Package Size 25 pc - 2235179 - Cutting disc 6 x .045 x 7/8 T1 P - Package Size 25 pc - 2234753 - Cutting disc 7 x 1/16 x 7/8 T1 P - Package Size 25 pc
